com.badlogic.gdx.input.recorder

Class InputRecorderConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.input.recorder.InputRecorderConfiguration

  • public class InputRecorderConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to configure new instances of InputRecorder

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean absoluteCoords 
      com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle outputFile
      Will be ignored if you set a different InputRecordWriter later
      boolean recordButtons 
      int recordedPointerCount
      The number of pointers recorded if recordPointers is enabled.
      boolean recordKeyEvents 
      boolean recordKeysPressed 
      boolean recordOrientation 
      boolean recordPointerEvents 
      boolean recordPointers 
      InputRecordWriter writer
      The default value is null, meaning that the InputRecorder will create a default InputRecordWriter (a JsonInputRecordWriter)

        public com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle outputFile

      • recordButtons

      • recordPointers

        public boolean recordPointers

      • recordOrientation

        public boolean recordOrientation

      • recordedPointerCount

        public int recordedPointerCount
        The number of pointers recorded if recordPointers is enabled. LibGDX doesn't provide more than 20 buffer spaces for pointer values to be stored in, so be aware that setting this value higher than 20 is very likely to cause crashes.

      • recordKeysPressed

        public boolean recordKeysPressed

      • recordPointerEvents

        public boolean recordPointerEvents

      • recordKeyEvents

        public boolean recordKeyEvents

      • writer

        public InputRecordWriter writer
        The default value is null, meaning that the InputRecorder will create a default InputRecordWriter (a JsonInputRecordWriter)
